overview:
Chief Technical Officer

Mr. Glendinning is a co-founder of Uronimo and has extensive expertise in network protocols, cellular protocols and web based systems development.

Mr. Glendinning has over 15 years programming experience in C, C++, php, Visual Basic, SQL, Java and prior to Uronimo, co-founded Innovative Direct Marketing which developed the product â€œMobile Merchant.â€ Prior to that, Mr. Glendinning was the lead programmer at WEBVIP and also co-founded Bridgeworks which operated a successful online community to provide online services to businesses.
